{{ title }}

Strohm Native is my attempt at improving the way cross-platform mobile apps are developed. If you want to learn more about my motivation, please read my blog post ReactNative, Flutter, Cordova, etc: the state of the art is not good enough. This project is under active development. It is in its early stages. I consider it usable at the moment, but there are plenty of rough edges. You can find a more detailed status overview on GitHub.

If you're feeling courageous and want to dive in, proceed to Getting Started.
